markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Preparation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1804) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 136 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You survey the battlefield, calculating the possibilities. You gain one additional reaction, which you can use before the beginning of your next turn for any rogue reaction.
name: Preparation
